properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 150 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
IN VICINITY AL KHOMS (32-39-27N 14-16-18E)
AT 112000Z AUG VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO:
1. JRCC LIBYA
   TEL 2182 1444 6799, 2182 1563 1578
   FAX 2182 1360 6868, 2182 1444 6799
   MAIL: SAR@ANS.CAA.GOV.LY SALEM.ELKABIR@CAA.GOV.LY
2. INTERIM LIBYAN MRCC OPERATING 24H
   TEL/FAX: 2182 1444 9149, 2182 1444 9274
   PHONE: 2182 1444 9488
   EMAIL: LCG.NAV.ROOM@GMAIL.COM NHA@LTTNET.NET
3. LIBYAN NAVY/COAST GUARD
   PHONE: 2182 1444 9488, 2189 2517 9382
   FAX 2182 1360 6868
   EMAIL: LIBYAN.NAVAL.COMMS.CENTRE@GMAIL.COM
4. RCC MALTA
   TEL 356 2124 9784
   FAX 356 2180 9860
   MAIL RCCMALTA@GOV.MT
5. MRCC TUNIS
   TEL 216 7156 0244
   FAX 216 7156 1804

6. IMRCC ROME
